system.description:
Conjures fresh, drinkable water from thin air, creating up to 10 gallons that fills containers or creates puddles.

Scaling: At dice count 3, creates 50 gallons. At dice count 6, can create other liquids (wine, oil). At dice count 9, creates 200 gallons. At dice count 12, can create a flowing stream. At dice count 15, creates a permanent water source.
